title: More Developments In Boston's New Terror Case
teaser: Federal authorities are investigating a conspiracy to kill police officers in Massachusetts
contentencoded:
Federal authorities have charged a man in Everett, Mass., with conspiring to destroy a smart phone in order to impede their investigation of a plot to kill Massachusetts police officers. David Wright is being held without bail until his probable cause hearing in two weeks. He made his first court appearance yesterday.

Fred Thys, from  Here & Now contributor WBUR, reports on the latest from the case hitting Boston only two years after the Marathon Bombings killed three people.
